description: Maximum number of states needed to accept an n-th order approximation to a language over (0+1)^*, n=1..infinity.
references: J. Shallit and Y. Breitbart, Automaticity I: Properties of a measure of descriptional complexity, J. Comput. Sys. Sci. 53 (1996), 10-25 (esp. p. 19).
author: _Jeffrey Shallit_
